jobDescription: Position ID 234039Title Sr. Account ExecutiveDescriptionSales Search Partners is currently seeking a Senior Account Executive for our Boston based technology client. As a Sr. AE you will be responsible for high-level business development including hunting and closing net new logos with accounts in the Northern territory.  Requirements:  · 4-5+ years of experience in a sales hunting role within technology, preferably SaaS  · 4+ years of quota achieving closing experience  · Poses executive-level communication skills needed to engage at a C-level  · Ability to build credibility and establish strong relationships with CISOs, which is a strategic but also technical minded audience.  · Bachelors Degree  $200k OTE uncappedPosition Type Perm
